scripts.prepublish: command -v grunt > /dev/null || { echo >&2 'It appears that "grunt" is not installed.  Consider running "[sudo ]npm install -g grunt-cli" first.'; exit ; } && grunt
scripts.test: command -v grunt > /dev/null || { echo >&2 'It appears that "grunt" is not installed.  Consider running "[sudo ]npm install -g grunt-cli" first.'; exit ; } && grunt test
